contentrichtext.text: {{Use dmy dates|date=November 2012}} {{refimprove|date=April 2008}} {{Infobox Military Conflict |conflict=Operation Phantom Linebacker |partof=[[War on Terrorism]], [[Operation Iraqi Freedom]] |image= |caption= |date=Early August 2004 |place=[[Baghdad]], [[Iraq]] |casus= |territory= |result=Designed to interdict anti-government fighters from entering [[Iraq]] from [[Syria]] |combatant1={{flagicon|United States}} [[United States]]<br/> {{flagicon|Israel}} [[Israel]]{{Citation needed|date=April 2008}}<br/> {{flagicon|Iraq}} [[Iraqi National Guard]]<br/> {{flagicon|South Korea}} [[South Korea|ROK forces in Iraq]] |combatant2={{flagicon|Syria}} [[Syria]],<br/>{{flagicon|Iraq}} [[Iraqi Insurgency]] |commander1={{flagicon|South Korea}} Capt. Kim Chu Young |commander2={{flagicon|Syria}} Unknown<br/> {{flagicon|Iraq}} Unknown |strength1= |strength2= |casualties1= |casualties2= |casualties3= |notes= }} {{Campaignbox Iraq War}} '''Operation Phantom Linebacker''' was a coalition [[military operation]] in [[Iraq]] designed to [[interdiction|interdict]] anti-government fighters from entering [[Iraq]] from [[Syria]]. The U.S. 3rd Brigade and the [[2nd Infantry Division (United States)]] conducted the operation with the [[Iraqi National Guard]], Iraqi Border Police, and other Multinational Forces. The [[III Corps (United States)|U.S. III Corps]] uses ‘Phantom’ as its nickname. Launched in early August 2004. ==Military Units Involved== ;US forces reported to be involved were *3rd Brigade, United States Army *[[2nd Infantry Division (United States)]] ;Iraqi Units involved *[[Iraqi National Guard]] *[[Iraqi Border Police]] ==Casualties== No US, Coalition or Iraqi casualties or deaths were reported during the operation. ==References== *[http://www.mnf-iraq.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=3720&Itemid=21|Multi National Force - Iraq] {{Portal box|United States Marine Corps|Iraq}} {{2004 Operations}} {{Iraq War}} {{coord missing|Iraq}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Phantom Linebackert}} [[Category:Military operations of the Iraq War involving the United States]] [[Category:Military operations of the Iraq War involving Iraq]] [[Category:Military operations of the Iraq War in 2004]] [[Category:Iraqi insurgency]] {{US-mil-operation-stub}}
